comments.body:
NNAPI_VERBOSE_VALIDATION doesn't look used in the nnapi_delegate.cc.
Also could you also update Bazel build file?

The NNAPI_VERBOSE_VALIDATION ifdef's the implementation of the AddValidationFailure() and AddValidationFailureFmt():
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/458234a3d34326d353814be0d4f85f6713c59ea0/tensorflow/lite/delegates/nnapi/nnapi_delegate.cc#L1529-L1539
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/458234a3d34326d353814be0d4f85f6713c59ea0/tensorflow/lite/delegates/nnapi/nnapi_delegate.cc#L1542-L1555

The bazel is up-to-date already. It contains an aditional cc library (nnapi_delegate_verbose_validation), including this option:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/458234a3d34326d353814be0d4f85f6713c59ea0/tensorflow/lite/delegates/nnapi/BUILD#L46-L65

Could you update indentation as the following? 
```
cmake_dependent_option(TFLITE_ENABLE_NNAPI_VERBOSE_VALIDATION
    "Enable NNAPI verbose validation." OFF "TFLITE_ENABLE_NNAPI" ON)
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +63,67 @@option(TFLITE_ENABLE_RESOURCE "Enable experimental support for resources" ON)
option(TFLITE_ENABLE_NNAPI "Enable NNAPI (Android only)." ON)
cmake_dependent_option(TFLITE_ENABLE_NNAPI_VERBOSE_VALIDATION "Enable NNAPI verbose validation." OFF
                       "TFLITE_ENABLE_NNAPI" ON)
option(TFLITE_ENABLE_MMAP "Enable MMAP (unsupported on Windows)" ON)
